summary: This bill, the Protecting Life and Integrity in Research Act of 2025, prohibits the federal government from conducting, funding, or supporting research involving human fetal tissue obtained from induced abortions. It permits research on tissue from miscarriages or stillbirths, amending the Public Health Service Act accordingly. The bill also prohibits soliciting, acquiring, or accepting donations of human fetal tissue knowing it was obtained through an induced abortion. Furthermore, it repeals a section of the National Institutes of Health Revitalization Act of 1993.
